extension.name: Subscription and Notifications Package
extension.author: Antonina Zdebska
extension.description: Subscription and Notifications Package contains Newsletter Subscription Module and Notifications on New Article Content Plugin. Newsletter Subscription Module allows your site visitors subscribe for news using email and/or via telegram channel. Notifications on New Article Content Plugin will automatically notify your subscribers on new articles via telegram and/or email. Subscription list is stored within module directory in txt file, you can add or remove subscribers from it as you like. Don't forget to enable extensions and edit settings fields so everything could work properly.
